changeSet.author: ovlajic
changeSet.sql: create sequence company_document_seq; create table if not exists company_document ( id bigint not null constraint company_document_pkey primary key, access_level_id bigint constraint company_document_fk_on_access_level references document_access_level, title varchar(255), type_id bigint constraint company_document_fk_on_type references company_document_type, upload_date timestamp, url varchar(255), company_id bigint constraint company_document_fk_on_company references company );
